Effect.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Gains 500 ATK/DEF for each card in your hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ravenous Crocosaur Archetis" once per turn.
● If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can draw cards equal to the number of non-Tuner monsters used for the Synchro Summon of this card.
● (Quick Effect): You can discard 2 cards, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
